name: Karen Craigo
bio: Poet and editor Karen Craigo’s chapbook, Stone for an Eye (2004), won the Wick Chapbook Competition. Her poems have also appeared in Poetry magazine, Indiana Review, Crab Orchard Review, and elsewhere.    Her honors include two Individual Artist Awards from the Ohio Arts Council and a fellowship at the Provincetown Fine Arts Work Center. With Michael Czyzniejewski, Craigo serves as editor-in-chief for the Mid-American Review. She has taught at Bowling Green State University and as a visiting artist in Ohio schools with support from the Ohio Arts Council. She lives in Ohio. ﻿
